file_content.text: I require your attention. Do not tarry.
Good. You're here.
Astute observation, Agent Shan. It is a wonder the SIS could get by without your deductive reasoning.
Five minutes. Can we please go five minutes without you two at each other's throats?
SCORPIO, don't be rude. And Theron, you know better than to give into her taunts.
You're acting like children.
Setting the clock... three... two... one....
Starting now. Go!
I didn't walk over here for my health.
Stop wasting time.
Why do I feel like you're encouraging more than helping?
Everyone's touchy today. Fine.
Sorry. Stress got the better of me.
SCORPIO, show the Commander what you found.... Please.
My analysis of enemy communications obtained by Havoc Squad revealed something... interesting.
Hidden inside a mundane signal, I discovered encrypted transmissions, code-named, the "GEMINI Frequency."
They are broadcast from the throne to every vessel in the Eternal Fleet. The Spire schematics provided by Kaliyo confirm this.
It's how Arcann commands his warships. This is the break we've been waiting for--a direct line to the enemy fleet.
Start a plan of attack. It's Arcann's turn to be on the defensive.
You're a droid that's gotten too big for her own bolts. How's that for an astute observation?
